channel.title: DeltaScape npc spawning
channel.description:
Hello, I've edited my autospawn configuration file to spawn my npc(s) of choice. But when I log in, they aren't spawned there. What have I done wrong?
[code] //spawn = ID 0 coordX coordY X Y X Y walktype //Varrock East Bank spawn = 494 0 3252 3418 0 0 0 0 1 spawn = 494 0 3252 3420 0 0 0 0 1 spawn = 494 0 3252 3422 0 0 0 0 1 spawn = 494 0 3252 3426 0 0 0 0 1 //Varrock West Bank spawn = 494 0 3187 3436 0 0 0 0 1 spawn = 494 0 3187 3438 0 0 0 0 1 spawn = 494 0 3187 3440 0 0 0 0 1 spawn = 494 0 3187 3442 0 0 0 0 1 spawn = 494 0 3187 3444 0 0 0 0 1 spawn = 494 0 3187 3446 0 0 0 0 1 [ENDOFSPAWNLIST] [/code]
I would greatly appreciate it if someone could help me.

item.title: DeltaScape npc spawning
item.dc:creator: @Clawz_fury lare69
item.description:
@Clawz_fury wrote:

post the method that loads the cfg file, and the actual method that loads the npc

Read full topic

item.title: DeltaScape npc spawning
item.dc:creator: @hipeanutbutter hipeanutbutter
item.description:
@hipeanutbutter wrote:

[quote=“arham 4, post:6, topic:469881”][quote author=escalation link=topic=587191.msg4167316#msg4167316 date=1353858516]
Have you compiled? I know it’s a stupid question but it has to be asked
[/quote]
You don’t compile cfg files. That’s only for java files. Do you even know what compiling does?

Have you compiled? I know it’s a stupid question but it has to be asked

Yes, of course. I’ve been sitting here programming other things. So its been compiled 50+ times, lol. I don’t understand why they aren’t spawning. I’m not looking for source code, but an explanation or something could help, honestly. If you could or someone else could help me figure this out, I’d be appreciative of it.

Same to you.

OT: Should be a problem related to NPCHandler/NPC.[/quote]

Nah, you don’t say… I thought the cfg files were used to read the plain text from the Java files, while the class files were just random data written by windows task manager.

Read full topic

item.title: DeltaScape npc spawning
item.dc:creator: @hipeanutbutter hipeanutbutter
item.description:
@hipeanutbutter wrote:

Hello, I’ve edited my autospawn configuration file to spawn my npc(s) of choice. But when I log in, they aren’t spawned there. What have I done wrong?

//spawn = ID	0	coordX	coordY	X	Y	X	Y	walktype
//Varrock East Bank
spawn = 494	0	3252	3418	0	0	0	0	1
spawn = 494	0	3252	3420	0	0	0	0	1
spawn = 494	0	3252	3422	0	0	0	0	1
spawn = 494	0	3252	3426	0	0	0	0	1
//Varrock West Bank
spawn = 494	0	3187	3436	0	0	0	0	1
spawn = 494	0	3187	3438	0	0	0	0	1
spawn = 494	0	3187	3440	0	0	0	0	1
spawn = 494	0	3187	3442	0	0	0	0	1
spawn = 494	0	3187	3444	0	0	0	0	1
spawn = 494	0	3187	3446	0	0	0	0	1
[ENDOFSPAWNLIST]

I would greatly appreciate it if someone could help me.

Read full topic
